articles.title: Asian stocks fall amid China-EU trade jitters; inflation in focus By Investing.com - Investing.com

articles.content: Investing.com--Most Asian stocks fell on Monday, with Chinese markets leading losses on the prospect of a trade war with the European Union, while anticipation of key U.S. inflation data also kept se… [+2356 chars]
